channel.title: Dialog box help

item.title: Dialog box help
item.dc:creator: @testcrasher1 testcrasher1
item.description:
@testcrasher1 wrote:

So basically i have a 508 client that allows the user to input a server ip into a dialog box. I was wondering if it would be possible to add some code that automatically puts the name of the server in the dialog box so the user just has to press “ok” in order to connect, rather than having to type it out every time they have to reconnect to the server.

here is the code for the dialog box (i think this is all of it, not too sure to be honest) :

Class75_Sub2.aBoolean3314 = false;
            Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null,"Please enter IP address:");
            Class26.aRSString_521 = Class68_Sub28_Sub2.aRSString_4556;
            Class68_Sub13_Sub20.anInt3780 = 0;
            client var_client = new client();
            var_client.method21(765, 503, 109, 27, "runescape", 508,
                                32 - -Class13_Sub4.anInt2690);
            Class108.aFrame1832.setLocation(40, 40);

Thanks in advanced.
